description: E-commerce product catalog with cart functionality

intents.requirement: When user clicks 'Add to Cart' button on a product card, the product is added to the cart state and the cart icon badge updates to show the new total item count.
The product list page displays products in a 3-column grid on desktop (viewport > 1024px) and a single column on mobile (viewport < 768px).
When user enters text in the search field, a debounced search (300ms delay) filters the product list to show only products whose name contains the search text (case-insensitive).
Each product card displays: product image (200x200px), product name (max 2 lines with ellipsis), price in USD format ($X.XX), and 'Add to Cart' button.
When cart is empty, the cart page displays 'Your cart is empty' message with a 'Continue Shopping' link that navigates to /products.
